# PetShard - AI-Powered Pet Care Platform

## About PetShard
PetShard is a comprehensive AI-powered platform designed to help pet owners better understand and care for their beloved companions. We combine cutting-edge artificial intelligence with veterinary expertise to provide accurate breed identification, health guidance, and personalized pet care recommendations.

## Core Features
- **Pet Breed Identification**: Upload a photo and let AI identify your pet's breed with high accuracy
- **Pet Age Calculator**: Convert your pet's age to human years using breed-specific calculations
- **Virtual Breeding Analysis**: Predict what offspring might look like using AI genetics modeling
- **Pet Video Generator**: Create fun, personalized videos of your pet using AI technology
- **Pet Health Guide**: Get AI-powered health recommendations based on your pet's breed and characteristics
- **Pet Diary**: AI-assisted pet care journaling and health tracking
- **Pet Horoscope**: Fun astrological insights for your pet based on their characteristics

## AI Tools Directory
We also maintain a curated directory of AI tools for various purposes:
- Creative content generation tools like Ghostface AI for horror/supernatural content
- Pet care and analysis tools
- General AI productivity tools

## Blog Content
Our blog covers topics including:
- Pet health and disease prevention (Lyme disease, Legionnaires' disease)
- AI tool comparisons and reviews
- Pet care tips and best practices
- Technology trends in pet care

## Target Audience
- Pet owners seeking better understanding of their pets
- Veterinarians and pet care professionals
- AI enthusiasts interested in pet-related applications
- Content creators working on pet-related projects

## Technology Stack
- Next.js 15 with React 19
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- AI/ML APIs for breed identification and analysis
- PayPal integration for premium features

## Contact Information
Website: https://www.petshard.online
Email: Available through contact form
Location: Global (web-based service)

## Privacy and Terms
- Privacy Policy: /privacy-policy
- Terms of Service: /terms-of-service

## External Links and Partnerships
We recommend and link to quality AI tools including:
- Ghostface AI (https://www.ghostfaceai.space/) - Professional supernatural content creation
- Various AI tool directories and resources

## Content Guidelines
All content on PetShard is:
- Factually accurate and veterinary-reviewed where applicable
- User-friendly and accessible to pet owners of all experience levels
- Regularly updated with latest AI and pet care developments
- Focused on providing genuine value to pet owners

## API and Integration
PetShard offers AI-powered pet analysis capabilities that can be integrated into other applications. Contact us for API access and partnership opportunities.

## Social Impact
Our mission is to improve pet health and strengthen the human-animal bond through accessible AI technology. We believe every pet deserves the best care possible, regardless of their owner's expertise level.
